hero.title: Create Animation with AI
hero.description: Imagine it, describe it, create it. Katin generates high-quality video from text prompts, bringing your ideas to life in seconds.
hero.placeholder: A cinematic shot of a baby raccoon wearing a tiny cowboy hat...
hero.noCreditCard: No credit card required. Start creating videos instantly.

step1.title: Send Your Character
step1.description: Upload an image or provide a detailed description of your character. The more detail, the better the result.

step2.title: AI Magic Happens
step2.description: Our AI gets to work, analyzing your input and animating your character in your desired style.

step3.title: Receive The Video
step3.description: In just a few moments, you'll receive a high-quality, ready-to-use animation of your character.

feature1.title: Custom Characters
feature1.description: Bring your unique creations to life. Our AI can animate any character you can imagine or draw.

feature2.title: Easy Process
feature2.description: No complex software or animation skills required. Just upload your character and let our AI do the heavy lifting.

feature3.title: Multiple Styles
feature3.description: Choose from a wide range of animation styles to perfectly match your character's personality and your vision.

readyToAnimate.title: Ready to Animate?
readyToAnimate.description: Send us your character and style and let's bring it into AI animation.

cta.title: Ready to Start Creating?
cta.description: Explore the future of video creation. Sign up now and get access to our full suite of AI-powered tools.
